nodes.text: The B'omarr Flats were an expanse of land in the Northern Dune Sea of Tatooine near the Great Mesra Plateau. The Great Pit of Carkoon was located in this area.

The Battle of the Great Pit of Carkoon took place in the area during the Galactic Civil War. Soon after that battle, Kuat of Kuat, the leader of Kuat Drive Yards, arranged a bombing run of the area around the Great Pit of Carkoon.
